column5: In case you were planning on consuming or playing with some of the local critters!  http://m.thespec.com/news-story/6160511-raccoon-in-hamilton-tests-positive-for-rabies
Read that the other day, If those were my dogs I'd be getting charged with something
She loves the dogs so much, like her kids, but can't remember if they were vaccinated for rabies???
So much wrong here. How do you not keep your dogs up to date with their vaccinations? Especially with kids ???

Putting a raccoon in a van with dogs probably isn't the smartest thing to do either... BUT, what if animal control was only planning to relocate the problem coon to a new area?? We would never have known about the rabies.. I'm going to have to be vigilant about them.. who knows how many around are rabid!!
My vet sends me a notice when my dog's shots need to be renewed? I also have a folder with his vet bills and shot records in it.  I don't like to see Racoons or Skunks wandering around my yard!
There's a helicopter flying over the house dropping vaccination baits in a grid pattern... I'm safe now!!
Yeah they found another 3 or 4 in doing some trapping
